projectGridLines.title: Thesis Building and Innovation Curation
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Social Alpha works in the domain of Climate and Sustainability where our teams constantly

identify new problem statements and build our impact thesis, which encapsulates our knowledge of the

sector and defines our strategy. In Climate and sustainability, our focus areas include Energy Transition,

Sustainable Mobility, Circularity and alternative materials, Urban Transition (Water and air pollution,

Sustainable Construction), Industrial Decarbonisation and Carbon Capture, utilization, and storage. The

interns will work with the sectoral teams in helping refine our impact thesis, evaluate new start-ups for

a thesis and mandate fit with Social Alpha, assist the team in the investment process and participate in

venture-building activities for our investment portfolio.

Skill sets: Technology evaluation, financial modelling, building business models, market research and

estimation, strategy

Expected learning: Insights into emerging deep science technologies spanning multiple sectors,

venture development, equity investments and portfolio management

Specific courses required for project execution: Courses related to Business Analysis &

Valuation, New Venture Creation, Entrepreneurship

projectGridLines.title: Data Analyst Intern â€“ Governance, Insights and Analytics Team
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The team is responsible for ensuring the efficient management, analysis, and

interpretation of data critical to our organization's success. This role will play a pivotal part in managing

our deal pipeline and program management platform, driving insights, enhancing data systems, and

monitoring key performance indicators (KPIs) and objectives. The intern will assist the team in

developing and maintaining a database and generating insights from the data.

Skill sets: Experience in data analysis and database management (Airtable experience is preferred or

other relevant RDBMS), Data Visualisation tools like Power BI.

Expected learning: The students will learn the creation and management of RDBMS, data visualization

(Tableau/Power BI), process improvement and automation, and soft skills.

Specific courses required for project execution: Database Management Systems, Data

Visualisation, Data Science
